page.title: 18Trade:Shops:Rosneath & Rhu
page.content: Rosneath:GENERAL STORE-owned Arthur Payne-sells food, drink(including alcohol) newspapers etc.POST OFFICE- In former Smiddy.Anvil at door. BUTCHER rented by Robert MacIntyre HABERDASHERY rented 'Jenny a' Things' l empty shop. RHU: POST OFFICE/GENERAL STORE NEWSAGENTS/GENERAL STORE. 3 empty shops. Unlike supermarkets village shops can't buy in bulk therefore prices higher.Also no variety and many make weekly shopping trips further afield. TOURISM & RECREATION:RHU Marina built on land reclaimed either side of existing pier.Problems with breakwater as material keeps sinking. Yacht chandlery on site. KIDSTON PARK:Car park, swing park, toilets, picnic area.
